name: Furniture_of_America_Pierson_Contemporary_Flannelette_Sofa
description: Choose this handsome and warming flannelette upholstered sofa to furnish your living space. Plenty of room is available for guests and the inner cushions provide a designated resting area for tired arms.Set includes: One (1) sofaUpholstery: Flannelette fabricUpholstery color options: Beige, navy or warm greyUpholstery fill: FoamGently tufted accent along back and seatInner arm padding for extra comfortFlared arms add a slight curve to the structureEspresso finished wood block legsSoft flannelette upholstery along entire exteriorMatching chair and loveseat available, sold separatelyAll dimensions are approximateSeat dimensions: 18 inches high x 22.5 inches deepSofa dimensions: 32.5 inches high x 75.5 inches wide x 35 inches deepFurniture Pattern: SolidType: SofaStyle: Contemporary, Modern, CasualMaterial: Fabric, Wood, FoamAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: Blue, Grey, BeigeColor: Blue, Grey, BeigeStyleCasual, Contemporary, ModernMaterialFabric, Foam, WoodTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBeige, Blue, GreyFurniture PatternSolid
